oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Alberta Survey, 1999
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Population Research Laboratory
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The 1999 Alberta Survey (AS) was the twelfth annual provincial survey administered by the Population Research Laboratory (PRL). This omnibus style survey of households in the province of Alberta has enabled academic researchers, government departments, non-profit organizations, and the private sector to explore a wide range of research topics in a structured research framework.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Arts and Humanities
Social Sciences
demographics

health risks
